channel.title: Don't reorder tag selector while using
channel.description:
I occasionally end up selecting the wrong tag because selecting an older tag first reorders the list.
Ordering the tag strip to "newest first" is helpful at the beginning, but not while in the process of using. Thanks!

item.title: Don't reorder tag selector while using
item.dc:creator: galtenberg
item.description:
This one still pinches, on a weekly basis.

When one of the tags I intend to use starts on the left side, I frequently end up tapping wrongly when the list reorders.
